member.name: D3D10_MAPPED_TEXTURE2D
member.summary: Provides access to subresource data in a 2D texture.

member.name: D3D10_MAPPED_TEXTURE2D.RowPitch
member.summary: The pitch, or width, or physical size (in bytes), of one row of an uncompressed texture. A block-compressed texture is encoded in 4x4 blocks (see virtual size vs physical size) ; therefore, RowPitch is the number of bytes in a block of 4x4 texels.
